BEAST::SimObject Class Reference
[Simulation Framework]

An abstract base class for the Population template, allowing populations with different templated types to be represented in Simulation. More...

#include <simulation.h>

Detailed Description

An abstract base class for the Population template, allowing populations with different templated types to be represented in Simulation.
